heading: Section 4: Determining Your Name Conditions
subheading: Sometimes, a character will have a plot­based condition that affects their name. You, too, might have a condition that affects your name. Conditions can stack, so please make note of how many your name has.

data.subPrompt: Roll a d4 to determine whether you have this condition.
